about.bio: As Head of Operations at GPI Software, I have led the development of three key SaaS platforms, creating mathematical and AI-driven models that optimize personnel assignment and supply chain management for major clients. My work has resulted in significant efficiency gains, including up to a 60% improvement in staff allocation and a 16% reduction in operational costs. With a Master’s in Operations Management and a background in Data Science, I specialize in transforming complex operational challenges into data-driven, automated solutions.

platforms.name: StaffSyncro Platform (personnel assignment)
description: Sole developer of mathematical models for assignment.
Software currently active, assigning more than 8,000 people.
Responsible for studies on staff reduction without compromising operations, achieving up to a 16% reduction.
Improvement in personnel assignment of up to 60%.
Product Manager for clients such as Forus, Abcdin, and La Polar.
Leader of the fulfillment team, standardizing requirements and measuring customer response time.

platforms.name: StaffAttendance Platform (Attendance Control)
description: Part of the team for the comprehensive design of attendance control software.
Company representative for over 25 clients, managing 4,000 people on SaaS.
Design and partial development of additional reporting for the Labor Directorate.

platforms.name: SupplySyncro Platform (Supply Chain Management)
description: Manager of the development of software for planning the procurement of over 10,000 SKUs.
Sole developer of mathematical models using AI combined with conventional models for sales forecasting.
Coordinator of the application design and development, supported by client feedback.

education.degree: Data Science, Big Data & Neural Networks - Python

projects.name: Video Analysis
projects.description: Software that extracts information from security cameras for reporting.
